name: Podamibe 2Checkout
author: Podamibe Nepal

sections.description:
Podamibe 2Checkout is a FREE WordPress plugin that help you to pay easily. It also allows you to add/display the pay button on any post or page or sidebar easily. The Podamibe 2Checkout plugin is responsive and feature rich which is built up to simplify the user needs.

Free Features:

  • Shortcode Based
  • Multilanguage Ready
  • Credit Card Payment Option
  • PayPal Payment Option
sections.installation:
1. Unzip podamibe-2checkout.zip.
  2. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/podamibe-2checkout.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. For customizing the plugin’s settings, click on 2Checkout in WordPress left admin menu and click on Settings.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

It Helps you to pay your mony from website easily.

Do I need to design the plugin?

You won’t need to take any burden regarding the design as since we have already provided Desigin.

Where can I find the documentation for the plugin?

Once you install the plugin , you can check some general documentation about how to use the plugin in the “How to use” panel of the plugin’s settings page.

How can I display the Podamibe 2Checkout payment options?

Use this for “[P2Checkout amount=”give your pay amount here” orderid=”give order id here”]” shortcode to display in content. For template use <?php echo do_shortcode(‘[P2Checkout amount=”give your pay amount here” orderid=”give order id here”]‘);?>.
